question: Which institution has directed for appointment of woman IPS officer in every district of Kerala to oversee POCSO related cases?
option2: Ministry of Women and Child Development
explanation:
The High Court of Kerala has issued a set of directives to the state regarding Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act (POCSO).
The High Court has directed the state to appoint woman IPS officer in every district, to oversee the cases investigated under POSCO Act. It has also directed to establish One-Stop Support Centres, in lines with the Supreme Court directions, to protect the victims.
